content: crochet stars for christmas in drops muskat drops design pattern no r-704 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements large star approx 8 cm / 3 1/8 in diameter measured from tip to tip small star approx 7 cm / 2¾ in diameter measured from tip to tip materials drops muskat from garnstudio 50 g in each of the following colors color no 08 off white color no 19 light gray color no 61 light beige color no 30 vanilla 1 small star weighs approx 3 g 1 large star weighs approx 4 g drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c or size needed to get 22 double_crochet x 11 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm
